title: Ichiban Chikakute, Tooi Futari
original_name: いちばん近くて、とおいふたり
sinopse:
1. Little Garden
2. Water Garden
3. Himawari Saita
4. Futari, Sora no Shita de (The Two of Us, Together Under the Sky)

   6-9. Osananajimi to Yobanaide! (Don't Call Me Your Childhood Friend!)
6. Ichiban Chikakute, Tooi Futari (Closer, yet Further Apart than Anyone)
